item.description:
Join New Haven runners in training for the Hartford Marathon. We will have training runs on the weekends and possibly during the week as well.

From the website:

"Our race course combines the vibrancy of downtown Hartford with brilliant autumn foliage, quaint country roads, the majestic Connecticut River and the revitalized Park Street neighborhood. Run our race and you will view 19th century homes, pumpkin farms, beautiful gardens, and a breathtaking view of the Connecticut River. Runners are supported all along the course by entertainment and crowds of cheering spectators."

http://www.hartfordma...
item.name: Hartford Marathon
